flawed_nl_solution:
3/5th of 20 liters of water is 20*(3/5) = <<20*(3/5)=100/3>>100/3 liters
5/6th of 18 liters of vinegar is 18*(5/6) = <<18*(5/6)=15>>15 liters
100/3 liters of water mixed with 15 liters of vinegar gives 100/3+15 = <<100/3+15=145/3>>145/3-liter mixture
#### 145/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 100/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
